attributes.action: Ensure that the Red Arrows are a Part of the Opening Ceremony for the 2012 Olympic Games
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am furious that something so wonderful can be dismissed as being 'too British'.  I have never heard anything so disgusting and wonder what sort of message this is creating. We should be proud to include this unique display and show what is great about our country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
